author: Mark Murray
title: The Democratic Party still looks like Obama's party
description: The Democratic primary revealed that more Democratic voters wanted a return to policy positions held by former President Barack Obama.
content:
The Democratic Party still looks like Obama's party
WASHINGTON  With former President Barack Obama endorsing his vice president, Joe Biden, on Tuesday, its worth recalling that the 2020 exit polls revealed that more Democratic primary voters said they wanted… [+28325 chars]
